channel.title: Unearthed Arcana: Giant Options
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Unearthed Arcana: Giant Options"

item.title: Re: Unearthed Arcana: Giant Options
item.content:encoded:
Sure thing! Sorry about not linking them in threads, I was attempting to experiment with a way to format collaborative work, though yeah I can see if this is a bit rougher to work with for importing into the site. If I do such a thing in future, Ill remember to put the links onto the discussion forums as well once the work has been completed

Welcome back Fred, good to see you. No worries on the delay, everyone gets like that from time to time I think? Its just nice to see you're still out and about

item.title: Re: Unearthed Arcana: Giant Options
item.content:encoded:
All these have been added to the front page. Sorry for the delay, just been unmotivated on things lately.

Also if in the future could we include links to all the new pages on these threads? Just makes it a bit easier to add them to the main page.

Thanks!

item.title: Re: Unearthed Arcana: Giant Options
item.content:encoded: Feats are finished and ready to go, now all I need is somebody to bring everything onto the front page (:

item.title: Re: Unearthed Arcana: Giant Options
item.content:encoded: Subclasses complete, just to add them to their respective class pages now. And then of course, the 10 feats

item.title: Unearthed Arcana: Giant Options
item.content:encoded:
We really do have a nice set of work needed as of late, with the wikidot coming back online, and then just now, we've got new UA

Link: https://dnd.wizards.com/unearthed-arcana/giant-options

Being a bit more experimental with our checklists, here's a google spreadsheets link, which will let us all update the same spreadsheet, rather than waiting for one of us to update our table in our own comment, which should help it run a little smoother
